title: 24K Golden J-Hook
description: Crafted in pure 24-Karat gold, this single J-hook makes a fine addition to any Macroexpand lure!

title: 24K Golden Double J-Hook
description: Crafted in pure 24-Karat gold, this double J-hook features a single eye with two golden shanks and will make all your poor friends say, WOW!

title: 24K Golden Treble J-Hook
tag: For when two points just isn't enough.
description: Crafted in pure 24-Karat gold, this versatile treble J-hook features a single eye with three golden shanks, for catching only the most high-class fish!
